Software Projects

Vehicle Registration Program [https://github.com/bcheema007/vehicle-registration-system]
  • Developed a program allowing a registered user to rent and drop off vehicles. System has the ability to register new users with restrictions on the type of password allowed.
  • Implemented bonus features such as viewing the rental history of a particular vehicle and the ability to see which vehicles are in inventory based on a specific type of vehicle.
  • Utilized: Java, JUnit testing, Eclipse IDE
Website For A Friend [https://youthful-jepsen-0ed3a8.netlify.com/index.html]
  • Developed a website for my best friend which gives site visitors the opportunity to watch Sickage’s most recent and/or most popular video, and information on how to get in contact with him.
  • Deployed using Netlify. Integrates Netlify’s built-in form handling process so that a visitor can easily get in contact with Sickage. Incorporates basic spam protection using Netlify’s service.
  • Utilized: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, SASS, Font Awesome, Netlify, Git, Visual Studio Code
Portfolio Website [https://www.bcheema007.com/]
  • Developed a portfolio website which provides information about my current skills, an about me page, my resume, and a contact me page with a contact form.
  • Deployed using Netlify and integrates Netlify’s built-in form handling process and spam protection.
  • Utilized: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Sass, Netlify, GitHub, Visual Studio Code
